Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Deficiency of the ninth component of human complement ( C9 ) is the most common complement deficiency in Japan but is rare in other countries .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Deficiency of the ninth component of human complement (C9) |

Explanation:

The "Disease" entity in the paragraph is "Deficiency of the ninth component of human complement (C9)". It is a medical condition where there is a deficiency of the ninth component of the human complement system, which is a part of the immune system.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| Deficiency of the ninth component of human complement (C9) |

Explanation:

The only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a "Disease" is "Deficiency of the ninth component of human complement (C9)". The other entities such as "Japan" and "other countries" are locations and do not refer to diseases.
